## Output monitores 


```{r, echo=FALSE}

mixes <- c(
    "MIX1 "="DRUMS - ALEJO",
    "MIX2 "="DRUMS - ALEJO",
    "MIX3 Mono "="KEY - CUZCO",
    "MIX4 "="BASS - PEDRO",
    "MIX5 "="GTR 1 - LUCAS",
    "MIX6 "="GTR 2 - PAPO",
    "MIX7 "="LEAD VOX - CAMILO",
    "MIX8 "="SIDE FILL L",
    "MIX9 "="SIDE FILL R"
)

speaker <- c(
    "MIXER STEREO 1 - 2",
    "MIXER STEREO 3 - 4",
    "WEDGE MONO",
    "WEDGE MONO",
    "2X WEDGE MONO",
    "2X WEDGE MONO",
    "2X WEDGE MONO",
    "MIX7 "="SIDE FILL L",
    "MIX8 "="SIDE FILL R"
)
index <- 1:length(mixes)
data <- data.frame(MIX=index,  MUSICO=mixes, MONITOR=speaker )
datatable(data, class = 'cell-border stripe', caption = "Table 2: Output List ", rownames=FALSE,  extensions = 'Buttons', options = list(
              dom = 'Bfrtip',
              buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
pageLength = 12

))
```
